<section begin="EliteEnemyDesc" />Players will often find '''Elite Enemies''' in the open world while exploring, or in [[Domains]] and the [[Spiral Abyss]]. 

These enemies are stronger than [[Common Enemies]], and are generally found in sparsely throughout the overworld, either with other Elite Enemies or by themselves. Some Elite Enemies share some drops with Common Enemies, but most Elite Enemies generally have their own unique drop of [[Character and Weapon Enhancement Material|ascension materials]]. While some Common Enemies are on par with Elite Enemies in terms of attacks and strength (such as [[Kairagi]] and high-leveled [[The Eremites|Eremites]]), they are not considered Elite Enemies. At low [[Adventure Rank#World Level and Ascension|World Levels]], elite enemies have also been noted to drop 1 and 2 star Weapons. Some Elite Enemies will serve as a mini-boss in certain quests.

'''Note:''' There are a limited number of spawns per day, which will reset daily according to whatever the [[World Reset Timers|Daily Reset Time]] is for the player's server/region.<section end="EliteEnemyDesc" />

Elite Enemies generally drop 5 [[Mora]] per level, although the values vary based on difficulty - weak Elite Enemies, like [[Mitachurls]], cap at 200, moderates like adult [[Rifthounds]] cap at 400, while particularly strong and/or rares like [[Lawachurls]] cap at 600 Mora. [[Rocky Avildsen]] and [[Liam]] drop 50 Mora per level and cap at 3000. They drop three times as much [[Character EXP]] compared to Common Enemies at their level bracket. All Elite Enemies may also drop the following [[Artifacts]]:
{{Artifact Set|Traveling Doctor|3|show_caption=1}}{{Artifact Set|Berserker|3-4|show_caption=1}}{{Artifact Set|Instructor|3-4|show_caption=1}}{{Artifact Set|The Exile|3-4|show_caption=1}}

Drops from Elite Enemies are capped at 400 per day; after this, any Elite Enemies killed afterwards will not award any experience or drops, and is not restricted to World Level.<!-- documented in Data Gathering discord server
Further kills yielded no exp/mora/artifacts/drops
https://discord.com/channels/767763445445033984/781016196325048320/817127950817689641 -->
